headline: Lowe’s Builds on Stable Demand and Shareholder Returns
summary: Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2026. Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) stands out as a reliable dividend payer. The company maintains a payout ratio of roughly 40% of earnings and an even smaller share of free cash flow. That coverage leaves room for […]

headline: Lower rates aren't moving the housing market. What gives?
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma sits down with Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the housing market and whether lower interest rates will actually end up being a tailwind for the sector. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
